name: Dear Santa
summary_text: A young woman from a privileged life falls for a soup-kitchen owner after discovering a Dear Santa letter written by his 7-year-old daughter.

name: Sweet Liberty
summary_text: After selling the rights of his book to a movie production company, a writer finds himself fighting the many egos and varying views around him.

name: Inescapable
summary_text: Years after he left Damascus under suspicious circumstances, Adib Abdel Kareem must confront what he left behind when his daughter goes missing.

name: Rent-A-Pal
summary_text: 1990: David, 40, looks after his dementia mom. He uses a video dating service to no avail. He buys a "Rent-A-Pal" video tape and things change.

name: Parang-juuibo
summary_text: Beautiful student Su-Eun prevents her fellow student Su-Ho to drown in the ocean. Su-Ho however, does not know who saved him, until Su-Eun tells him after a while. The love between them ...                See full summary »

name: Carry on Cruising
summary_text: Captain Crowther's lot is not a happy one! Five of his crew have to be replaced and at such short notice before the voyage begins there isn't much to choose from. Not only does he get the ...                See full summary »

name: The Pride and the Passion
summary_text: During the Napoleonic Wars, a British captain is sent to Spain to help prevent the French from stealing a powerful cannon.

name: Les Girls
summary_text: The former members of a dance troupe are suing because of recently published memoirs. Each one insists on own point of view.

name: Good Sam
summary_text: When a mysterious good samaritan leaves $100,000 cash on seemingly random doorsteps, New York City news reporter Kate Bradley sets out to discover the true identity and motive of "Good Sam."

name: Banana Split
summary_text: Over the course of a summer, two teenage girls develop the perfect kindred spirit friendship, with one big problem: one of them is dating the other's ex.

name: ZG80
summary_text: Series of events leading to football fans war on the streets of Belgrade.

name: Cold War II
summary_text: Picking up some time after the events in the first movie, Sean Lau is now the Commissioner of Police after the successful rescue operation. However, things turn bad when his wife and ...                See full summary »

name: Kronjuvelerna
summary_text: When she's arrested for attempting to murder the son of a factory owner, Fragancia spins a tale of love and betrayal that began in her youth.

name: Tapas
summary_text: The small, everyday stories of a group of neighbours who live in a suburb of Barcelona, and the little secrets that they hide.

name: Company Business
summary_text: A retired CIA agent is recruited to participate in a prisoner exchange with the Russians.

name: Invasion of the Bee Girls
summary_text: A powerful cosmic force is turning Earth women into queen bees who kill men by wearing them out sexually.

name: Ritual
summary_text: A man must save his two children when they disappear during a holiday in the woods.

name: Blackboards
summary_text: Itinerant Kurdish teachers, carrying blackboards on their backs, look for students in the hills and villages of Iran, near the Iraqi border during the Iran-Iraq war. Said falls in with a ...                See full summary »

name: Shaan
summary_text: Two brothers go after the international mafia kingpin who murdered their cop brother. They are later joined by another man who wants revenge against the gangster.

name: The Spider's Stratagem
summary_text: A man returns to the place where his father was murdered and tries to find closure. But he finds himself in a similar predicament as his late father instead.

name: Ya shagayu po Moskve
summary_text: Young Siberian writer Volodya meets Kolya in the Moscow metro in his visit to a famous author. Volodya and Kolya's friend Sasha adventure their love interests in their own way, while Kolya sets out to help them.

name: Solis
summary_text: After a space mining operation gone bad, Troy is on an emergency escape vehicle drifting towards the sun. He gets radio contact with possible help but will they get there in time?

name: In My Country
summary_text: A journalist and a poetess meet during the hearings of South African Truth and Reconciliation Commission.

name: The Boyfriend School
summary_text: Cartoonist Gus has survived cancer treatment and now his romance novelist sister tries to find him a woman and guide him. Will they succeed?

name: Indiscretion of an American Wife
summary_text: Prior to leaving by train for Paris, a married American woman tries to break off her affair with a young Italian in Rome's Stazione Termini.

name: And Breathe Normally
summary_text: Two women's lives will intersect while trapped in circumstances unforeseen. Between a struggling Icelandic mother and an asylum seeker from Guinea-Bissau, a delicate bond will form as both strategize to get their lives back on track.

name: Vatsalyam
summary_text: Raghavan, a farmer, devotes his life to ensure that his brother Vijayakumaran gets educated. But with time and under the influence of his rich wife, Vijayakumaran ends up destroying all relationships.

name: Tatli Dillim
summary_text: Traditional love story of a ladies' man falling for an ingenue from the village and discovering what true love is.

name: Henry Gamble's Birthday Party
summary_text: Preacher's kid Henry Gamble is turning 17 today. Bring your swimsuit.

name: Deep in the Darkness
summary_text: A doctor and his family move to a quiet, small town. Soon he discovers the town's dark secret: A terrifying race of controlling creatures that live in the darkness in the forest behind their home.

name: Bonneville
summary_text: Three women take a road trip to Santa Barbara in order to deliver the ashes of one of their dead husbands to his resentful daughter.

name: Comedy Central Roast of Pamela Anderson
summary_text: Comedy Central's best roasters and stand up comedians take a whack at actor/model Pamela Anderson.

name: LOC: Kargil
summary_text: Based on the real story during Kargil war fought between India and Pakistan in 1999.

name: En Büyük Saban
summary_text: A good man tries to help a blind girl to see again but he doesn't have enough money for the operation.

name: The Hands of Orlac

name: Blue Iguana

name: Uzak Ihtimal
summary_text: Muezzin Musa falls for his neighbor, the Catholic nurse Clara. The story gets even more exceptional when Musa meets Yakup, who turns out to be connected with Clara.

name: Sadie Thompson
summary_text: A prostitute seeking a fresh start becomes the obsession of a religious extremist.

name: Mother
summary_text: A story about a family torn apart by a worker's strike. At first, the mother wants to protect her family from the troublemakers, but eventually she realizes that her son is right and the workers should strike.

name: The Big Bad Fox and Other Tales
summary_text: Whoever thinks that the countryside is calm and peaceful is mistaken. In it we find especially agitated animals, a Fox that thinks it's a chicken, a Rabbit that acts like a stork, and a Duck who wants to replace Father Christmas. If you want to take a vacation, keep driving past this place.

name: Salvage
summary_text: Claire Parker is going to die at the hands of a sadistic and depraved killer, she will endure a terrifying, unimaginable brutal death, and it will all happen again, and again.

name: Malicious
summary_text: A widower and two of his sons become infatuated by their beautiful housekeeper, and all three set out to seduce her using their own unique methods.

summary_text: Mukadder died suddenly one night. Cause of death was cerebral hemorrhage. According to her sister, the killers are different sizes. There are demons behind everything.

summary_text: A bestselling crime novelist who is desperately looking for a new story hones his focus on the apparent suicide of a small-town woman, an aspiring model who thought she was the reincarnation of Marilyn Monroe.

summary_text: A suburban town in Japan is the victim of what is supposedly just an urban legend, a woman's spirit with a horribly disfigured face who is intent on kidnapping children for unknown reasons.

name: C Blok
summary_text: Tulay, a restless woman whose marriage is slowly disintegrating sets out to come to terms with various traumas while continually being watched by Halit, a resident in her apartment complex.

summary_text: A vacation to Ibiza with a lot of parties. A part of a family lives on the island and the rest is visiting and that causes a lot of drama.

summary_text: A handsome young prostitute learns about life and love during a sex-filled odyssey in an apartment building filled with strange inhabitants.

name: Third Person Singular Number
summary_text: A woman breaks with traditional Muslim culture by living with her boyfriend before getting married, but when the relationship ends, she must face the harsh consequences of being an outcast in her community.

name: Under the Greenwood Tree
summary_text: In this lighthearted romance from Victorian novelist Thomas Hardy, the beautiful new village school teacher is pursued by three suitors: a working-class man, a landowner, and the vicar.

summary_text: A jazz musician seeks refuge from a lynch mob on a remote island, where he meets a hostile game warden and the young object of his attentions.

summary_text: A neuron-transfer scientist experiments with the thoughts of a comatose young woman.

summary_text: Professor Thurber loves to teach, but can't stand all the politicking. So when his opportunity for tenure is announced, he goes out on a limb to prove his worth, but unexpectedly falls in love with the girl who might replace him.

summary_text: When a family of five rent a beautiful house for their summer vacation, the price seems too good to be true.

name: Glass Jaw
summary_text: Glass Jaw is the redemption story of Travis Austin, a one time champion boxer who goes to prison and loses everything. After his release, he experiences the trials and tribulations of redeeming his reputation, his belt, and his true love.

summary_text: A crusading newspaper editor tricks his retiring star reporter into covering one last case.

name: The Farmer's Wife
summary_text: After his daughter weds, a middle-aged widower with a profitable farm decides to remarry, but finds choosing a suitable mate a problematic process.

summary_text: Rebeca and Marc make a travel to discover their mutual family pasts in Rebeca's grandparents house.

summary_text: Six strangers wake up in cells in an underground facility. Their captive decides their fate with the roll of a die.

name: The Way West
summary_text: In 1843, a former U.S. Senator leads a wagon train of settlers to Oregon, but his megalomania leads to growing dissatisfaction with his leadership.

summary_text: A frustrated fan of the hopeless Washington Senators makes a pact with the Devil to help the baseball team win the league pennant.
On a bloody night in a place where we are supposed to feel safe, a young man and his beloved are struggling not to reach the hospital, but to run away from it. They are trying to survive the night.

name: Vaterfreuden
summary_text: Felix enjoys his single life to the fullest, but a ferret bites him, sterilizing him in the process. He tries everything in his power to find the soon-to-be mother of his only child, the result of his first and last sperm donation.

summary_text: On the last day of school, two bullied teenagers decide to take revenge on their tormentors.

summary_text: A young couple dream of growing old together as they as they deal with the struggles of being in a long-term relationship.

Then, one night, Hamlet is visited by his father's ghost who commands him to avenge his murder at the hands of Claudius.

name: Algiers
summary_text: Beautiful Gaby meets a romantic jewel thief in the mysterious Casbah.

summary_text: Dr. Shukri Mokhtar is a renowned social psychology specialist, best known for his ability to answer the simplest questions, who decides to give one last lecture about the very simple question: "how do we love?".

name: Transpecos

summary_text: After his brother returns home from war, Jacob Singer struggles to maintain his sanity. Plagued by hallucinations and flashbacks, Singer rapidly falls apart as the world and people around him morph and twist into disturbing images.

summary_text: Against the backdrop of grisly murders and child abductions, a clan of cannibalistic savages which plague the North-east Coast since 1858, is after an unsuspecting family and their innocent baby girl. Do they have what it takes to survive?

name: Fire & Ice
summary_text: Ruled by King Augustin, Carpia is a peaceful kingdom in a world inhabited by dragons and knights. The land's serenity is unexpectedly shattered by a Fire Dragon that spreads almighty fear and death amongst the kingdom's innocent people.

name: Je t'aime, je t'aime
summary_text: After attempting suicide, Claude is recruited for a time travel experiment, but, when the machine goes haywire, he may be trapped hurtling through his memories.

name: Shadow
summary_text: When a young soldier leaves for a mountain biking excursion, he meets the girl of his dreams as well as a group of violent locals who want to see them dead at any cost.

name: Last Embrace
summary_text: Harry breaks down and loses his job after his wife is assassinated - could it be his turn next ?

name: Angélique, marquise des anges
summary_text: In the first of the Angélique series, the beautiful feisty teenage heroine becomes entangled in a political assassination plot and is betrothed to a stranger who is twelve years her senior and a reputed sorcerer.

name: The Corn Is Green
summary_text: A schoolteacher becomes the mentor of a talented young miner and seeks to get him into a university.

name: The X-Files: Re-Opened
summary_text: Showing several previews on what will be happening on the coming season, and introducing new characters.

name: Beyond the Sky
summary_text: While shooting a documentary to expose the lies of alien abductees, a provocative filmmaker and his crew encounter a young woman with a dark secret who leads them to uncover a disturbing truth.

name: Someday This Pain Will Be Useful to You
summary_text: A vulnerable teenager with a deep perception of the world and no idea how to live in it.

name: Drømmen
summary_text: A drama about a boy who's inspired by Dr. Martin Luther King Jr. and challenges repressive school authority in 1969 Denmark.

name: Human Resources
summary_text: The 35-hour work week has all of France in its thrall. This film turns it into a feature about economic and familial politics. Frank, a business school graduate, returns to his provincial ...                See full summary »

name: A Private Function
summary_text: In post-World War II Britain, food rationing continues, leading a married couple to become involved in the flourishing bacon black market.

name: Venom
summary_text: Terrorists in the process of kidnapping a child get trapped in a house with an extremely deadly snake.

name: The Story of Diana
summary_text: She was beloved by millions, but plagued by hidden turmoil. A tale of royalty, resilience and the heavy cost of fame.

name: What's Cooking?
summary_text: Four families in LA of different ethnicity (Latino, Asian/Vietnamese, African and Jewish) gather together for Thanksgiving dinner.

name: The Peacekeeper
summary_text: When a terrorist group steals the US President's personal communications computer for launching the US arsenal in case of war, only a heroic Major has the key to prevent a Presidential assassination or a nuclear holocaust.

name: Norma Jean & Marilyn
summary_text: This film follows Norma Jean from her simple, ambitious youth to her superstar pinnacle and back down. She moves from lover to lover in order to further her career. She finds fame but never happiness, only knowing seduction but not love.

name: Cargo
summary_text: A young female astronaut, who joins a reclusive astronaut aboard a spaceship, struggles with her job as she interacts with mysterious Cargos that appear on the ship.

name: The Divine Order
summary_text: In 1971, a young housewife organizes the women of her town to petition for the right to vote.

name: Young & Wild
summary_text: Daniela, raised in the bosom of a strict Evangelical family and recently unmasked as a fornicator by her shocked parents, struggles to find her own path to spiritual harmony.

name: Mr. Bones
summary_text: A medicine man is sent looking for the son of his tribal king, and brings back an American golfer and a host of goons intent on keeping him in the golf tournament.

name: Personal Best
summary_text: The intertwined lives and loves of three highly-ranked athletes striving for the national team; Chris bounces between the beds of male coach Terry and her female friend, competitor, and role model Tory.

name: The Slipper and the Rose: The Story of Cinderella
summary_text: A musical retelling of the classic tale of Cinderella. In the tiny kingdom of Euphrania, the King and his court are anxious to get Prince Edward wed. But Edward wants to marry for love.

name: Beach Blanket Bingo
summary_text: In the fourth of the highly successful Frankie and Annette beach party movies, a motorcycle gang led by Eric Von Zipper kidnaps singing star Sugar Kane managed by Bullets, who hires ...                See full summary »

name: Selam
summary_text: This epic story is based on true events that has been in progress for more than 20 years in which a number of young people in love of peace and humanity leave their countries to teach, help...                See full summary »

name: Anche libero va bene
summary_text: A young father and his two children struggle to find harmony after his wife leaves them for another man.

name: The Spoilers
summary_text: In Nome, Alaska, miner Roy Glennister and his partner Dextry, financed by saloon entertainer Cherry Malotte, fight to save their gold claim from crooked commissioner Alexander McNamara.

name: Noise
summary_text: This is a story about the wrong person in the right place at the wrong time. Two heinous crimes have left a suburban town reeling.

name: Brother Orchid
summary_text: When retired racket boss John Sarto tries to reclaim his place and former friends try to kill him, he finds solace in a monastery and reinvents himself as a pious monk.

name: Feral
summary_text: Students fight to survive a weekend in the woods.

name: Frankenstein
summary_text: A married couple of scientists create a modern-day monster.

name: Kalyug
summary_text: A newly married couple is caught on camera during their honeymoon. When the wife commits suicide after the video is released on internet, the husband sets out to seek revenge.

name: Secuestro express
summary_text: Young couple Carla (Maestro) and Martin (Leroux) are abducted by three men and spend a terrifying night in Caracas as they wait for Carla's father (Blades) to hand over the ransom.

name: To Grandmother's House We Go
summary_text: When twins Sarah and Julie feel like their mom is tired of them, they take off on an exciting adventure to their great-grandmother's house and encounter a pair of villains along the way.

name: Dark Corners
summary_text: As Susan Hamilton sleeps, she dreams that she is another person in an alternative reality. As her greatest fears come to life, she is pursued by the notorious serial killer known as the Night Stalker.

name: Chello hongmijoo ilga salinsagan
summary_text: A cellist is haunted by strange events after a car wreck

name: Muck
summary_text: After narrowly escaping an ancient burial ground, a group of friends find themselves trapped between two evils, forcing them to fight, die, or go back the way they came.

name: The Way of War
summary_text: A paramilitary operative goes on a rampage after discovering a conspiracy to commit war.

name: Digging to China
summary_text: 10 y.o. Harriet's divorced mom owns and runs a motel. Harriet's an outsider and wants to leave. A woman stays there with her adult, disabled son who befriends Harriet.

name: X
summary_text: The story takes place in 1999, the Year of Destiny, and the beginning of the end of the world. The future of the universe rests on one young man, Kamui Shiro, who must destroy either the ...                See full summary »

name: Jik zin
summary_text: International Security Affairs agent Jon is on a dangerous mission to escort a criminal scientist to another country. En route, a member of his team, Sean, turns out to be a traitor and ...                See full summary »

name: From Noon Till Three
summary_text: After spending 3 unforgettable hours with an outlaw, a beautiful young widow turns her story into a worldwide famous book.

name: Nota
summary_text: A bachelor who is unaware of the political world is appointed a Chief Minister when his corrupt father retires.

name: Vénus noire
summary_text: In the 19th century, a black woman from Africa is on display throughout Europe as an exotic curiosity.

name: Program na winyan akat
summary_text: What kind of scenes in a horror film scares you the most? When a ghost appears totally unexpectedly? When the main character does not see the ghost sneaking up behind him? When at the very ...                See full summary »

name: Mais qui a tué Pamela Rose?
summary_text: FBI agents, Bullit and Riper are investigating the murder of the young stripper Pamela Rose, found murdered in a hotel room in Bornsville, a small American city without stories.

name: The Long Ships
summary_text: A vagabond Viking adventurer and a Moor both compete to find "The Mother of All Voices", a legendary golden bell near the Pillars of Hercules.

name: Cry of the City
summary_text: Police Lieut. Candella, longtime friend of the Rome family, walks a tightrope in the case of cop-killer Martin Rome.

name: Chce sie zyc
summary_text: The story of a boy suffering from cerebral palsy and his troubled growing up during Poland's transition in the 1980s and 90s.

name: Zombie Hunter
summary_text: When a street drug turns junkies into an army of zombies, a man named Hunter finds himself with nothing but a beat-up car and a trunk full of guns and booze, until he stumbles across a small band of survivors.

name: Sherlock Holmes and the Case of the Silk Stocking
summary_text: A serial killer stalking the teen-aged daughters of the aristocracy brings Sherlock Holmes out of his drug-filled semi-retirement.

name: The Negotiation
summary_text: An ace crisis negotiator faces off against a cold-blooded hostage taker. Over the course of 21 hours, she attempts to crack his unusually calm demeanor and force him to reveal his motivations.

name: All for One
summary_text: Four childhood friends, three now petty criminals and Martin (Jon Lange) a petty cop, are trying to bring down big time drug smuggler Mr. Niemeyer (Rutger Hauer), who has an art gallery as front.

name: Stoic
summary_text: A heated game of poker causes three men incarcerated for nonviolent offenses to brutalize their cellmate before taking drastic measures in order to cover up their crime.

name: The Drug King
summary_text: Set in Busan, South Korea during the 1970s, Lee Doo-sam builds an empire as a drug smuggler in the Busan underworld, while public prosecutor Kim In-goo attempts to take down Lee Doo-sam.

name: Thithi
summary_text: In a South Indian village, a centenarian's funeral brings together his free-spirited son, inheritance-hungry grandson and girl-crazy great-grandson.

name: The Assassin Next Door
summary_text: A woman forced to work for the Russian Mafia as an assassin agrees to help her next-door neighbor kill her abusive husband.

name: Thammudu
summary_text: An aimless student is banished from his home by his father. When his brother, a boxing champion, gets injured, the student must step up and take his brother's place.

name: Princess Caraboo
summary_text: A mysterious young woman speaking a strange language shows up in an English village, where she is taken in by aristocrats who assume she is a foreign princess

name: Il ladro di bambini
summary_text: Antonio, a policeman (carabiniere), has an order to take two children (Rosetta and her brother Luciano) from Milan to Sicily to an orphanage. Their mother has been arrested for forcing ...                See full summary »

name: Jaatishwar
summary_text: The life and notable works of Anthony Firingee a 19th century Bengali language folk poet of Portuguese origin.The time frame of the storyline jumps between two different time periods-19th century and the present day.

name: Linkeroever
summary_text: When Marie moves into her boyfriend's apartment, she uncovers a disturbing mystery.

name: Lajja
summary_text: The lives of four women from different places are the victims of male chauvinism and marital abuse. They decide to fight for their rights and dignity against the social norms and injustice.

name: The Virgin Queen
summary_text: Sir Walter Raleigh (Richard Todd) overcomes court intrigue to win favor with Queen Elizabeth I (Bette Davis) in order to get financing for a proposed voyage to the New World.

name: Interreflections
summary_text: In a quest for a new, more humane society, a counter-culture revolution takes the world by storm. In the first of the InterReflections Trilogy, we look back to the modern world and wonder how it was we managed to survive as long as we had.

name: Vuosaari
summary_text: Naked Harbour tells the story of people who seek love and acceptance at any cost.

name: House Hunting
summary_text: 2 families looking for a new home go to an isolated open house, but when they find a girl with no tongue, they soon discover they can't leave.

name: Before the Revolution
summary_text: Following the death of his friend, an Italian youth grows increasingly closer to his young aunt.

name: Les Bonnes Femmes
summary_text: Four Parisian women navigate the world of romance and daily life looking to fulfill their dreams but often find real-life to be inescapable.

name: Italiano medio
summary_text: A man tries a pill that reduces his brain activity. Using only 2% of his mind, he becomes the perfect "average Italian".

name: Dinoshark
summary_text: A baby dinoshark evolves into a ferocious predatory adult, terrorising tourists and locals offshore from Puerto Vallarta, Mexico.

name: Sex with Love
summary_text: A group of parents who have gathered to debate the sexual education schooling of their fourth grade children are forced to re-examine their own views of sex.

name: The Death Wheelers
summary_text: An amiable, psychopathic leader of a violent teen motorbike gang is spurred by his mother, a Satan-worshiping spiritual medium, into committing suicide and returning to life as an "undead".

name: Carry on Spying
summary_text: A top secret chemical formula has been stolen by STENCH (the Society for the Total Extinction of Non-Conforming Humans), and so Agent Simpkins and his three trainees are hot on the trail, ...                See full summary »

summary_text: An elite high school and the chaotic Leo-Weiß school are threatened with closure: the school ministry has decided to close one of two schools in town. In order to convince possible ...                See full summary »

name: Miss Castaway and the Island Girls
summary_text: A spoof that combines Cast Away with Miss Congeniality, Planet of the Apes, Love Boat, Gilligan's Island, The Sixth Sense, Jurassic Park, and more

name: The Wicker Tree
summary_text: Charmed by the residents of Tressock, Scotland, two young missionaries accept the invitation to participate in a local festival, fully unaware of the consequences of their decision.

name: With Six You Get Eggroll
summary_text: Two widowed people fall in love and marry, unprepared for the hostile reactions of their children.

name: Torture Garden
summary_text: An anthology of four short horror stories about people who visit Dr. Diabolo's fairground haunted-house attraction show.

name: Ghost in the Shell Arise: Border 3 - Ghost Tears
summary_text: Motoko and Batou work to try to stop a terrorist organization whose symbol is the Scylla. Meanwhile, Togusa investigates a murder of a man who possessed a prosthetic leg manufactured by the Mermaid's Leg corporation.

name: Text
summary_text: Ilya Goryunov is 27, and has spent the last seven years in prison on a false charge of dealing drugs. Finally outside, he's driven by his desire for revenge against Petr, the rich kid who ...                See full summary »

name: The Laws of Thermodynamics
summary_text: A neurotic scientist tries to balance his love story with a famous top model with his obsession about that Laws of the Thermodynamics rule their relation.

name: Yeong-hwa-neun yeong-hwa-da
summary_text: A gangster who wants to be an actor; an actor more gangster than anything. Here their paths and lives begin to cross.

name: Spud
summary_text: It's South Africa 1990. Two major events are about to happen: The release of Nelson Mandela and, more importantly, it's Spud Milton's first year at an elite boys only private boarding school.
